ygData.subject: RE: Bard Superstitions?
ygData.msgSnippet: In most well rounded groups I ve been in, I m always going HTH. I believe non-monk classes cap at 100 for hand to hand, if that s true, I m four skill points
ygData.messageBody:
In most well rounded groups I've been in, I'm always going HTH.

I believe non-monk classes cap at 100 for hand to hand, if that's
true, I'm four skill points away.

Your lute/horn/drum/flute make better weapons than your pgt, dirk, blw,
btc, swa, etc...

You end up missing half the time anyway, when you could be healing
twice as much, magic resisting twice as much, and stunning/charming/
sleeping mobs for crowd control. =)

1h blunt, 160.
1h slash, 160.
piercing, 160.

hand to hand, 96 <g>

sitting around trying to fight pickclaw raiders with a group of
people whom I just handed 40 beers each and have tunnel vision...

...priceless.

Harmonic Distortion, 31st ding.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
